metadata.title: CVE-2021-47478 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: isofs:Fix out of bound access for corrupted isofs image When isofs image issuitably corrupted isofs_read_inode() can read data beyond the end ofbuffer. Sanity-check the directory entry length before using it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
